The second version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''February 27, 2010''' at 14:33 UTC.<!-- from jar date -->

== Changes ==
=== Mobs===
'''[[File:Steve JE3 BE1.png|120px]] [[Giant]]s'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Zombie JE1.png|120px]].

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Brick Pyramid.png|40px]] [[Brick Pyramid]]'''
* Changed height from 64/256 to 128.
** This means they now generate properly without being cut off, as intended.<ref>{{ytl|72Bc6zM8SO8|Putting Minecrafts /infdev/ To The Test}}</ref>
